|<%nL_SANKA_TENSEI> times before you can|join...

|advanced, so you can choose the level that|suits you best and challenge...

Good! I'm getting more and more interested in|you! But there's just a few things I need to|explain. But there's something I need to|

|can play will increase every day! I can't|wait to see what kind of opponents we'll|have! Also, you don't need a Battle Road|
|ticket to participate in battles, so you can|challenge as many times as you like... During|the battle, you control the leader monster|
